question:
You are working in a school. Write a letter to the Principal to recommend your friend for the position of sports teacher in your school. In your letter

– say how long you have known him/her
– describe his/her qualifications
– explain why you think he/she would be suitable for the job.
text: I am writing this letter to accommodate my friend as a sports teacher,Therefore, MrSmith who has been almost more than a decade since I have known him personally. Moreover, one of our Colleagues shared the opening of a vacancy for the same . Being the best trainer of his last assignment and shared partner of my flat , I would like you to consider his CV(attached) as a competent candidate.
Moreover,he also extends his expertise to the local community children over weekends at the National Park. You may get his feedback from the council as well.

Mr Smith owns a masters degree in arts.Moreover, he won double gold medals in Olympics in 2016 -2017.Also, he prepared athletes for the international level championship.Since our  school's new policies introduced a special quota for sports, I urge you to bring him on board. Adding more to it,I am confident that if we hire him as a coach , it would be a great investment in terms of the global level appearance of ABC school and the day will not be too far  when our pupils bring medals for us .
However, I would request you to give him a chance and I am sure the ABC school will never be regretted. Thus, pick him up as a competent applicant.
Looking forward to seeing  your positive feedback
